TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpellCheck extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供即時拼字檢查功能給文字編輯控制項，例如 和 。

span.span: Provides real-time spell-checking functionality to text-editing controls, such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要啟用拼字檢查程式，將屬性`true`文字編輯控制項上。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a text-editing control. 這會啟用拼字檢查，拼錯的字會使用紅色波浪線，底線標示在下圖所示。When this spelling checker is enabled, misspelled words are underlined by using a red wavy line, as shown in the following illustration. WPF 提供預設字典時，才支援拼字檢查程式。Spelling checker is supported only when WPF provides a default dictionary. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，WPF 提供字典英文、 法文、 德文以及西班牙文。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], WPF provides dictionaries for English, French, German, and Spanish. ![具有拼字 Textbox-檢查](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "具有拼字檢查的 Textbox")![Textbox with spell-checking](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "Textbox with spell-checking") 若要加入自訂字典，加入 lexicon 檔案的位置集合。To add a custom dictionary, add the location of the lexicon file to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IList CustomDictionaries { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.IList CustomDictionaries
Public ReadOnly Property CustomDictionaries As IList
public: property System::Collections::IList ^ CustomDictionaries { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用於自訂拼字檢查之 Lexicon 檔案位置的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spell checking.
The collection of lexicon file locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂字典使用字典檔，也就是使用.lex 副檔名的文字檔。Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are text files that have a .lex extension. Lexicon 檔案的每一行都包含單一文字接受為合法的拼字。Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling. 檔案的第一行，可以指定字典適用於地區設定識別碼 (LCID)。The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to. 如果未指定地區設定，字典適用於所有語言。If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[的地區設定識別碼](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。For more information, see [Locale IDs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561). 下列範例會顯示英文語言之詞素檔的前幾行。The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language. ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` 若要指定一個或多個自訂字典或任何衍生自的類別，加入至檔案的 URI 來指定 lexicon 檔案的位置集合。To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a or for any class that derives from , specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 使用來加入檔案以收集會導致例外狀況。Using to add a file to the collection causes an exception. 請改用和更新集合。Instead, use and to update the collection. Lexicon 檔案可以包含為本機電腦上安裝的內容檔案或資源檔編譯成本機應用程式中參考的組件。The lexicon files can be included in the application as content files installed on the local computer or as resource files compiled into a local referenced assembly. 您可以使用組件的 Uri 參考的檔案。You can reference the file by using pack URIs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). 若要啟用拼字檢查程式，將屬性`true`上或任何衍生自的類別上。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a or on any class that derives from . 所有的自訂字典，該除了預設拼字檢查程式會使用。All custom dictionaries for that are used in addition to the default spelling checker. 如需拼字檢查程式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the spelling checker, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入至兩個自訂字典。The following example shows how to add two custom dictionaries to a . XAML 會加入第一個自訂字典 (customwords.lex)。The first custom dictionary (customwords.lex) is added in XAML. 檔案是包含在應用程式中為內容檔案，複製到輸出目錄。The file is included in the application as a content file and copied to the output directory. 若要使用項目，您需要包含系統命名空間。To use the element, you have to include the System namespace. `xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=System"` 加入第二個自訂字典 (customwords2.lex)事件處理常式。The second custom dictionary (customwords2.lex) is added in the event handler. 檔案會包含做為資源檔，並編譯成名為 WPFCustomDictionary 應用程式組件。The file is included as a resource file and compiled into the application assembly that is named WPFCustomDictionary. [!code-xaml[WpfCustomDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/cs/window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[WpfCustomDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/cs/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WpfCustomDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得 Lexicon 檔案位置的集合，這些檔案位置用於自訂指定之文字編輯控制項上的拼字檢查程式。

span.span: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spelling checkers on a specified text-editing control.
The collection of lexicon file locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂字典使用詞典檔，也就是使用.lex 副檔名的簡單文字檔。Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are simple text files that have a .lex extension. Lexicon 檔案的每一行都包含單一文字接受為合法的拼字。Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling. 檔案的第一行，可以指定字典適用於地區設定識別碼 (LCID)。The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to. 如果未指定地區設定，字典適用於所有語言。If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[的地區設定識別碼](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。For more information, see [Locale IDs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561). 下列範例會顯示英文語言之詞素檔的前幾行。The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language. ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` 若要指定一個或多個自訂字典或任何衍生自的類別，加入至檔案的 URI 來指定 lexicon 檔案的位置傳回方法。To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a or any class that derives from , specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the returned by the method. 若要啟用拼字檢查程式，將屬性`true`上或任何衍生自的類別上。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a or on any class that derives from . 所有的自訂字典，該除了預設拼字檢查程式會使用。All custom dictionaries for that are used in addition to the default spelling checker. 如需拼字檢查程式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the spelling checker, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值決定此文字編輯控制項 (例如 或 ) 上是否已啟用拼字檢查程式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the spelling checker is enabled on this text-editing control, such as or .

value.span: 如果控制項上已啟用拼字檢查程式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the spelling checker is enabled on the control; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性也有特殊的唯寫的附加的屬性的使用方式。This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]設定屬性的語法就是`<` *textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue* `" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是衍生自類別物件項目，和*boolValue*是`true`或`false`（案例不區分大小寫）。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from , and *boolValue* is either `true` or `false` (case insensitive). 若要設定此屬性為附加屬性的程式碼中，請參閱方法。To set the property as an attached property in code, see the method. 沒有相符`GetIsEnabled`存取子。There is no matching `GetIsEnabled` accessor. 若要取得值，取得目前物件從屬性，然後取得的值屬性，從。To get the value, get the current object from the property, and then get the value of the property from that . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: Enables or disables the spelling checker on the specified text-editing control, such as or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您的附加的屬性使用屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This method enables an attached property usage for the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 下列範例所示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量。The following example shows the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetSpellingReform (System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase textBoxBase, System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform value);

public: static void SetSpellingReform(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::TextBoxBase ^ textBoxBase, System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform value);

param.name: textBoxBase
param.span: 要套用拼字檢查程式的文字編輯控制項。

span.span: The text-editing control to which the spelling checker is applied.

param.span: 範例控制項包括 和 。

span.span: Example controls include and .
The value that determines the spelling reform rules.

summary.span: 決定拼字檢查程式所使用的拼字修訂規則。

span.span: Determines the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所存取的拼字修訂規則是指 1990 年法文及德文的拼字修訂。The spelling reform rules that are accessed by this method refer to the French and German spelling reforms of the 1990's. 使用任何其他語言時，這個方法沒有任何作用。This method has no effect when it is used with any other language. 這個方法可讓您的附加的屬性使用屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This method enables an attached property usage for the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform SpellingReform { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform SpellingReform
Public Property SpellingReform As SpellingReform
public: property System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform SpellingReform { System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定拼字檢查程式所使用的拼字修訂規則。

span.span: Gets or sets the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

value.span: 拼字檢查程式所使用的拼字修訂規則。

span.span: The spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

value.span: 法文的預設值為 ，德文的則為 。

span.span: The default value is for French and for German.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所決定的拼字修訂規則是指法文及德文的拼字修訂。The spelling reform rules that are determined by this property refer to the French and German spelling reforms. 使用任何其他語言時，此屬性沒有任何作用。This property has no effect when it is used with any other language. 這個相依性屬性也有特殊的唯寫的附加的屬性的使用方式。This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]設定屬性的語法就是`<` *textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue* `" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是衍生自類別物件項目，和*enumValue*是值的字串名稱列舉型別。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from , and *enumValue* is a string name for a value of the enumeration. 若要設定此屬性為附加屬性的程式碼中，請參閱方法。To set the property as an attached property in code, see the method. 沒有相符`GetSpellingReform`存取子。There is no matching `GetSpellingReform` accessor. 若要取得值，取得目前物件從屬性，然後取得的值屬性，從。To get the value, get the current object from the property, and then get the value of the property from that . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
